attributes.action: Recognise Lemmy as a true bastion of Great Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The world is pretty rubbish right now. No matter what anyone does, at the moment nothing is good. Even my 9yr old son understands all that for crying out loud! However I took him to see Motorhead and it bloody give me hope-it give my son inspiration. Give Lemmy the recognition he deserves. And no this petition is not meant to be funny I am totally serious. Lemmy Kilmister has done at least as much for this country as Elton John and Cliff Richard. Please take me seriously.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
